constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: Non Material Amendment to Planning Permission 19/00202/HOU (Demolition of existing detached single storey garage and erection of two storey side and rear extension, extension of dropped kerb and parking area and new render finish to front boundary wall) to provided minor modifications to fenestration and erection of first floor extension above existing ground floor lean-to extension.
decision_conditions: Officers consider that the proposed changes are materially different to those approved under planning permission 19/00202/HOU. As such, the S96A application for a non-material amendment is refused.

The application seeks approval of the details required by Condition 9 (landscaping) of planning permission 21/01831/FUL.The wording of Condition 9 (landscaping) of planning permission 21/01831/FUL.Prior to the beneficial occupation of the development to which this permission relates,, a landscaping scheme shall have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority. The approved scheme shall be implemented within the first planting season following substantial completion of the development. The tree planting and landscaping shall thereafter be maintained for five years to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority.Any trees or shrubs which die during this period shall be replaced during the following planting season, and the areas shown to be landscaped shall be permanently retained for that purpose.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.Tha applicant has submitted a supporting statement and ground and roof plan showing the proposed landscaping. The details have been reviewed by officers including the LPA's tree and landscape Officer and officers are satisfied that in the context of the proposed development and the site the details meet the requirements for Condition 9 (landscaping) of planning permission 21/01831/FUL.

Fee required - The Town and Country Planning (Fees for Applications, Deemed Applications, Requests and Site Visits) (England) (Amendment) Regulations 2023 has revoked fee exemptions for applications where decisions for a previous application were made after 5th December 2023. The fee required for your planning application is Â£258.  Payment can be made online via the Kingston council website, or via our Contact Centre on 020 8547 5002.
